```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(asnipe)
library(igraph)
source('R/cmbDFrame.r')
data('identified_individuals')
```

The following are the data used in Shizuka et al. (2016)

```{r original datasets}
sparrow <- read.csv(url('https://datadryad.org/bitstream/handle/10255/dryad.63926/Flock_Season3_Dryad.csv'), na.strings = c('NA', ' ', ''))

tit <- identified_individuals[identified_individuals$Date == 1,]

thornbill <- read.csv('data/mmc1.csv')
```

```{r sparrow data}
sparrow <- cmbDFrame(sparrow[,-c(1:3)])
sparrow <- as.data.frame(sparrow$mrgCCombs[sparrow$mrgCCombs[,2] != '',])
```

```{r sparrow data}
sparrow_el <- sparrow %>% 
    select(-c(1:3)) %>%
    cmbDFrame()

sparrow_g <- sparrow_el$mrgCCombs %>% 
    data.frame() %>%
    mutate(X1 = as.character(X1), X2 = as.character(X2))
```

```{r}
#7668 and 7673
sum(sparrow_g[,1] == 7668 & sparrow_g[,2] == 7673, 
    sparrow_g[,2] == 7668 & sparrow_g[,1] == 7673)

sum(sparrow_g[,1] == 7668, 
    sparrow_g[,2] == 7668, 
    sparrow_g[,1] == 7673,
    sparrow_g[,2] == 7673)
```
